prompt:
Please search for and recommend the top 5 job opportunities for a Software Engineer with the following criteria:

- Location: Remote or San Francisco Bay Area
- Experience Level: Senior (5-10 years)
- Tech Stack: Python, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS
- Industry: Technology, SaaS
- Company Size: Startup to mid-size (50-500 employees)

For each job, please provide:
1. Company name
2. Job title
3. Location
4. Key requirements
5. Why this might be a good fit

Please format the results in a clear, easy-to-read structure.

jobs.title: Senior Backend Engineer (Python)
requirements: 5+ years professional experience building backend applications
4+ years working with Python and Python backend frameworks (Django, Flask, or similar)
3+ years working with common AWS services
Experience building and scaling REST APIs and event‑driven / real‑time systems
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
Background in startups or high‑growth environments; experience scaling systems to very high traffic is a plus
jobs.why_good_fit: Fully remote role at a fast‑growing ML/AI SaaS company building developer‑centric APIs, where your Python + AWS background and interest in scalable backend systems would be directly leveraged. While Docker/Kubernetes are not explicitly listed, the platform is cloud‑native and highly scalable, so containerization/orchestration experience will be useful. Company size and growth stage align well with startup/mid‑size preference.

jobs.title: Senior AI Product Engineer, Backend
requirements: 5+ years experience working with high‑performance backend systems
Strong experience with one or more of Go, Python, TypeScript/Node, Java, or similar
Experience building and operating complex SaaS platforms
Knowledge of public clouds and container orchestration (AWS, GCP, or Azure plus Kubernetes)
Interest in and familiarity with AI/LLM ecosystem and ML pipelines
jobs.why_good_fit: Remote‑first ML observability/SaaS company working on large‑scale distributed systems for AI & LLM monitoring. Your Python + AWS + Kubernetes background is directly relevant, and you’ll be working on high‑throughput, cloud‑native services in a startup‑to‑mid‑size environment with strong technical challenges.

jobs.title: Senior Backend Engineer (Python/Django)
requirements: 8+ years of experience working with Python backends (ideally Django)
Experience with web development, automated testing, CI/CD, and infrastructure management
Production experience with relational databases (MySQL; experience with Redis or other datastores is a plus)
Ability to work autonomously in a startup environment and collaborate in a remote‑first team
Familiarity with AWS, microservices, and containerization technologies is a plus
jobs.why_good_fit: Remote‑first Series B adtech/CTV SaaS startup in the 50–200 employee range where you can own significant backend features. While Docker/Kubernetes are listed as a plus rather than core requirements, your container and AWS experience should be valuable for their microservice and infrastructure evolution.

jobs.title: Senior Backend Engineer
requirements: 5+ years of experience as a backend engineer building scalable, reliable web applications (preferably in pre‑Series B startups)
Strong proficiency in Python (FastAPI in production)
Experience with AWS; familiarity with AWS cost and billing is a plus
Experience with Docker and container orchestration (Kubernetes)
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (Postgres and DynamoDB used internally)
Willingness to work on‑site 5 days per week in San Francisco
jobs.why_good_fit: YC‑backed early‑stage cloud cost‑optimization SaaS startup in SF that explicitly uses Python, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and LLM/AI. This is very close to your ideal tech stack and industry; the tradeoff is it’s fully on‑site rather than hybrid or remote, but it strongly matches your desire for startup‑stage impact in the Bay Area.

jobs.title: Senior Backend Engineer - Python
requirements: 5+ years experience developing backend systems with microservices architecture in cloud environments
Advanced proficiency in Python and SQL
Hands‑on experience with containerization and orchestration tools (Docker, Kubernetes, ECS)
Experience building recommendation systems and APIs
Experience with real‑time data processing (Kafka, Flink, or Kinesis)
Comfort working in fast‑paced, entrepreneurial/startup environments; strong communication and leadership skills
jobs.why_good_fit: Remote‑first SaaS company focused on AI‑driven talent matching, using a modern microservices stack on cloud infrastructure. This role leans heavily on Python plus Docker/Kubernetes and is squarely in the 5–10+ year senior band, making it a strong match for your technical background and preference for startup environments.
